definitions.definition: In the International System of Units , the derived unit of energy , work and heat ; the work required to exert a force of one newton for a distance of one metre . Equivalent to one watt-second (one watt of power acting for a duration of one second ).

main_definition: In the International System of Units , the derived unit of energy , work and heat ; the work required to exert a force of one newton for a distance of one metre . Equivalent to one watt-second (one watt of power acting for a duration of one second ).
